title: Large 2 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath w/ Pvt. Patio & Parking
description:
Two bedroom, 1.5 bath apartment in the heart of the Art Museum area.  Spacious, modern apartment with private brick paved garden area and reserved parking for one car in a private courtyard.  On the first floor is a kitchen with quarry tile flooring, large dining area, powder room, huge living room with fireplace, and sliding glass doors to the patio/garden area. The first floor has hardwood floors and the stairs, upstairs hallway, and bedrooms are carpeted.  On the second floor there are two good sized bedrooms with large closets, a full size bath with linen closet, and full size washer and dryer.  Amenities include efficient heat and central air conditioning, dishwasher, garbage disposal, fireplace, full size washer and dryer, private patio and dedicated courtyard parking.  This is a very clean and well maintained apartment/property on a safe block lined with mature trees.
The property is located two blocks from the Parkway, Art Museum, and Kelly Drive, seven blocks from Whole Foods Supermarket. Public transportation via SEPTA is on the corner, and it’s a 20 minute walk to Center City.  The block is residential; it’s only one block from Fairmount Avenue and all the shops, bars, and restaurants that go with it.  On Fairmount Avenue you will find: Klein’s Market,  Garden Fresh Produce Market, CVS and Rite Aid Pharmacies, Philly Flavors Ice Cream, Little Pete’s Pizza, six bars/restaurants, Sunoco Gas station, ACE Hardware, a bookstore, Jane and John Salon, Mugshots Coffee, the Eastern State Penitentiary Historical Site, Post Office, liquor store, dry cleaners, and more.  The location is very convenient without the summertime congestion/noise of Center City.
This is a great apartment with a great landlady for a great price.
$2,150 + gas and electric.  No smoking and no pets.
Available now.  If parking is not required, rent will be reduced to $2,000 per month plus utilities.

title: Brand New 4 Bedroom 2 1/2 Bath Home For Rent!
description: Welcome home to this 4 bedroom 2 and a half bath new construction home in Plymouth Township. Located in the desirable Colonial school district and situated on a corner lot that backs up to the 11 acre JFK Park. Upon entering the front door, you will immediately notice the beautiful on site finished hard wood floors. The home is bright and airy from the start, with a beautiful eat in kitchen equipped with walk in pantry, white cabinets, granite countertops and a large center island for seating. Plenty of room for a large table. The spacious living room has large windows, which lets in tons of natural light, as well as two sets of French doors that open to a lovely covered porch allowing for the entertainment to continue outdoors! Conveniently located, a large mudroom with access to the oversized two car-garage, and laundry room with a half bath complete this level. Upstairs you will find the size-able ensuite main bedroom with high ceilings large walk in closet and large bathroom with walk in shower. Three ample sized additional bedrooms and a full hall bath finish off the second floor. The large unfinished basement will add even more storage or entertaining space to the home. Make an appointment today!

Sun-soaked corner property in Northern Liberties! Within the walls of this gorgeous brick townhome, hardwood flooring, natural light, and generous living spaces await you! title: Spaciousness of true loft living! Welcome home!
description:
Welcome to Lofts 640 in the heart of Philadelphia, PA! Your monthly rent includes extended cable TV service, access to our fitness center, indoor/heated pool and hot tub with an attached outdoor roof deck, yoga/fitness studio, cyber lounge, 24/7 front desk attendant and more! As you enter 640 North Broad, you'll step away from the busy street and into an urban space that artfully blends the old with the new. The original character of the building has been enhanced by modern accents and furnishings, creating a unique and sophisticated environment. Our community is vibrant and welcoming, with state-of-the-art amenities designed to nurture both body and spirit. You'll love relaxing in our glass-domed pool house, where the warm salt water pool and Jacuzzi spa offer the perfect respite from the stresses of daily life. Meet and socialize with fellow residents on our rooftop deck lounge, or take advantage of our cyber cafe and yoga studio to stay connected and centered. Our lobby is a work of art, featuring geometric ceiling lights that illuminate the mocha-colored floors. With stunning white and stainless steel accents, the lobby is the perfect introduction to the energy and excitement of Loft 640. Located just six blocks from City Hall on Broad Street, our community is centrally located to shops, restaurants, hospitals, and the thriving community of Fairmount. Reading Terminal Market and the Pennsylvania Convention Center are just minutes away. Living at Loft 640 is the perfect combination of the commuter convenience of center city living and the spaciousness of true loft living. Welcome home!

title: Queen Village 3 Bedroom with Garage Parking
description:
This magnificent 3 bedroom / 2.5 bathroom townhome is a split level rental offering garage off-street parking, rooftop deck, oak hardwood floors, recessed lighting, in-unit laundry, central air, and so much more! Enter into the 1st level through the courtyard. The back garage enters halfway up with a little entry area and then up another half level is the beautiful modern kitchen and dining area with slate tile flooring and a full wall of windows for sunlight.
The kitchen overlooks Columbus Boulevard and the river, and boasts an island with counter seating, white shaker cabinets, lovely tile backsplash, and a full lineup of stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher and wine fridge. The kitchen cabinets extend into the dining area for extra storage and a powder room ensures that entertaining guests is a breeze!
Up another half level brings you into the spacious living room with a built-in speaker system featuring giant windows, a ceiling fan, fireplace, and a built-in desk with storage. Continue up another level to view 2 sizable bedrooms with good closet space, a full bathroom, and your in-unit washer and dryer.
Head to the top floor to view your primary bedroom with a courtyard view, ceiling fan for added comfort, walk-in closet with built-ins, and tons of space for a king sized bed plus additional furniture. An attached bathroom provides added luxury and is equipped with gorgeous tiling, dual sink vanities, and a stunning glass shower stall.
Your roof deck awaits upstairs with breathtaking Walt Whitman Bridge views. There's 1 garage off-street parking spot making this the ideal home for you!
This home is in the Meredith School Catchment.

title: Affordable 1-bed apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Square!
description:
Location Location Location! Available 08/1/2023. 20th & Walnut - only a 2 min walk to Rittenhouse Square, bars, restaurants, shops, historic places & more! This building is perfectly situated close to all the best spots in Philly, major universities, highways & whatever you can imagine. 2010 Walnut St was built in 1860 and was originally owned by the Wilkinson Sword Blade family. In recent decades, Eberhardt's Antiques operated out of the first floor. Now it is your chance to rent this amazing, affordable 1-bed apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Square! When you walk into the building, you will be amazed by the preserved historic details and gorgeous mirrors throughout the hallway. The building has a big shared rooftop with sublime views of the city! The apartment is located on the basement level of the building and has a small outdoor space! The details of the building will make every day walking in that hallway feel like a special occasion! The apartment can fit easily all of your furniture and you can comfortably host all of your friends and family. The bedroom has a spacious closet with an organizer, and space for a full/queen bed, desk, dresser, and more. It has stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher, central AC & Heating, a beautiful bathroom, and an in-unit washer & dryer! The only con is that there is not much natural light. It will be professionally cleaned before the new tenant's move-in date. Water is included in the rent. Pets are ok with a pet deposit and under 50 pounds. Inquire about the video tour! title: You’ll never want to leave your neighborhood!
description:
This unit features an extra room which can be used as an office or an additional bedroom Welcome to your new home, 735 Spruce Street, located in the heart of Philadelphia’s charming and historic Washington Square West neighborhood. This apartment features tall ceilings, a spacious floor plan, plenty of storage space, and oversized windows. Washington Square houses a large collection of historic 18th and 19th-century residential architecture that offers you a glimpse into Philadelphia’s past. A charming district filled with cobblestone streets and brick structures, you will never tire of the wide array of dining, shopping, sightseeing, and museums. Local attractions include Washington Square Park (5-min walk) and Penn’s Landing (along the waterfront), while historic attractions include the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall. Whole Foods Market, ACME, and one of the most well-known restaurants in Philadelphia, Zahav, are all within walking distance of the Properties. With so many local amenities you’ll never want to leave your neighborhood! 735 Spruce is also immediately catty-corner to Pennsylvania Hospital, offering nurses, residents, doctors, and employees of the nearby institution immediate access to housing.

title: House for Rent in Roxborough/Manayunk!
description:
Victorian 4 bedroom/2 full bath row home available in desirable Roxborough-Manayunk! Rent is $2550 plus utilities (water is paid by owner, gas, electric, and internet paid by tenant). The spacious living and dining rooms include original hardwood floors. The kitchen includes tiled flooring and counters, and newer appliances including a stainless steel fridge and dishwasher.
The hallway off the kitchen leads to a full bathroom and to the back of the house where there is a covered porch (with new roof), and long fenced in backyard which is perfect for hanging out with friends, as well as gardening. There is also a fully covered front porch and front yard.
The 2nd floor includes two bedrooms, one with a bay window with excellent light, and both with hardwood floors. There is also a room with built-in shelves, and an updated hall bathroom featuring a tiled shower, shelving, and new lighting. The 3rd floor includes two additional carpeted bedrooms. There is also a unfinished basement that runs the full length of the house, and includes a workshop area, plenty of room for storage, as well as a new washer and dryer.
This property is located on a wide, two-way street (rare in this neighborhood!), just one block from the shops and restaurants on Ridge Ave, including Starbucks, Primos, Santuccis, Bob's Diner, Acme, and UPS, and bars such as Hilltown Tavern and Twisted Gingers brewery, all withing walking distance. A short drive away is Wawa, Target, and Shop-Rite. Walking down the hill brings you to Main Street Manayunk where there are many restaurants, bars, and shopping. If you enjoy nature, the Wissahickon Valley Park and Manayunk Towpath are within walking distance. There is also the Manayunk bridge which goes across the river to the Bala Cynwyd Heritage Trail.
There is convenient Septa transit nearby, including both the and Regional Rail down the hill and multiple bus routes within one block. This property is also close to many colleges and universities, including Jefferson (Philadelphia University campus in East Falls), St. Joes, PCOM, LaSalle and Chestnut Hill College. Pets are allowed, 2 maximum, both dogs and cats, with one time pet deposit of $250. Additional animals can be reviewed on a case by case basis.
The house is radiator heat, and includes two air conditioner window units. No application fee, background checks and proof of income required. Co-signers are allowed. Security deposit and first and last month's rent required.
If interested, send me a message!

title: Queen Village - Renovated 1 Bedroom Apartment
description:
Welcome to Queen Village, where charm and comfort converge in this delightful 1 bedroom apartment. Nestled in one of Philadelphia's most sought-after neighborhoods, this cozy abode offers a perfect sanctuary for those seeking a tranquil urban retreat.
As you step inside, the gleaming hardwood floors instantly catch your eye, lending a warm and inviting atmosphere to the space. The open layout seamlessly connects the living area, dining space, and kitchen, creating a seamless flow for both relaxation and entertaining.
With central air conditioning, you can enjoy the perfect temperature all year round, ensuring your comfort no matter the season. The convenience of having laundry facilities right in the unit means no more trips to the laundromat or sharing with other residents. Efficiency and ease are at your fingertips.
The kitchen is a chef's dream, equipped with sleek stainless steel appliances that add a modern touch to the space. The granite countertops not only provide ample room for meal preparation but also add an element of elegance to the overall design.
Located in the heart of Queen Village, this apartment offers access to an array of amenities and conveniences. The neighborhood is renowned for its historic charm, tree-lined streets, and vibrant community spirit. You'll find a wide selection of cafes, restaurants, and boutiques just steps away from your doorstep, making it easy to explore and enjoy the local culture.
Don't miss the opportunity to make this cozy 1 bedroom apartment your own. With its desirable features, including hardwood floors, central air, in-unit laundry, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and abundant natural light, it's the perfect place to call home in Queen Village.
No Pets Allowed. Available August 1st

title: Where Luxury Meets Convenience!!
description:
Apt. 1110 — Manchester floor plan — 1,149 sq. ft. — $3,238
Located on the 1st floor, this 2-bedroom/2-bath corner apartment home has so much to offer! This beautiful apartment home comes with central air and heat, a full-size front-load washer & dryer, and stainless-steel appliances. The large master bedroom is equipped with a private balcony, a walk-in closet, and a spacious bathroom with double sink vanity & walk-in shower. The second bedroom/bathroom are spacious as well!  This gorgeous apartment has a prime view of our clubhouse, featuring a 24-hour fitness center, theatre room, resort-style swimming pool, and much more!
